resources.string: Note: This game is totally opposite, make your choices carefully.
Level 3/Level 1 : Questions are written in opposite but answers are normal. "\n""\n" Level 2: True/False based quiz.Questions are written normal but you must answer in opposite.
Mind Twister : A special type of game mode in which the wrong answer is actually right answer. "\n""\n"Normal Mode : The questions in this mode are regarding general knowledge and other fun stuff.
